resources.string: Notify other drivers\nwhen you spot customers
Holler notifies taxi drivers when customers are hailing taxis near them.\n\n
Holler is all about drivers helping drivers (and customers!). When nearby taxi drivers spot customers they can\'t pick up, you will get notified!
If you notice hailing costumers on the street but cannot pick them up, press the Holler button and free drivers nearby will get a notification.
